publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1912.1 Roseanna Cunningham: Impact of the European Union on Scotland—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1912) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, leave out from "and welcomes" to end and insert "but regrets the lack of imagination and ambition shown by the Scottish Executive and Convention of Scottish Local Authorities in their joint paper on the subject; deplores the Executive’s attendance record at EU Council meetings and poor representation at working groups, and recognises that, after the Treaty of Nice, Scotland would have significantly greater influence in the EU as an independent nation than as part of the UK. Supported by: Kay Ullrich*, Shona Robison*, Christine Grahame*, Andrew Wilson*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*
